attributes.description: A dictionary object, where each key corresponds to an attribute and its unique attribute id stored in the compressed geometry.

targets.description: An array of compressed Morph Targets, each compressed Morph Target is a dictionary mapping attributes (only `POSITION`, `NORMAL`, and `TANGENT` supported) to their deviations in the Morph Target.

items.description: A dictionary object, where each key corresponds to an attribute and its unique attribute id stored in the compressed geometry.
